code: import axios from'axios';import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import{useEffect,useContext}from'react';import{LoggedContext}from'../../App';function Logout(){var navigate=useNavigate();var _useContext=useContext(LoggedContext),loggedStatus=_useContext.loggedStatus,checkLoggedStatus=_useContext.checkLoggedStatus;useEffect(function(){axios.get('http://localhost:3001/auth/logout',{withCredentials:true}).then(function(response){if(response.data===true){checkLoggedStatus();navigate("/login");}}).catch(function(error){console.log(error);});});return null;}export default Logout;
